mapper.update: update gab_m_options set item_code = #{itemCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, name_ = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, value_ = #{value,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, isdelete = #{isdelete,jdbcType=SMALLINT}, self_format = #{selfFormat,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, hint_ = #{hint,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, order_id = #{orderId,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, item_code, name_, value_, create_time, update_time, isdelete, self_format, hint_, order_id from gab_m_options where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
